医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现口腔癌细胞如何阻止人体的免疫反应麦考瑞大学的研究人员发现了有关口腔癌细胞如何阻止人体免疫反应的新信息。这可能会为这种侵袭性疾病提供更好的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Researchers-discover-how-oral-cancer-cells-may-block-the-bodys-immune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Researchers-discover-how-oral-cancer-cells-may-block-the-bodys-immune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84395c6b-0f4a-4bf5-a042-4d74b886c2c8 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 09:22:02 -0400 Researchers discover how oral cancer cells may block the body's immune response
癌症患者出血比以前想象的更常见维也纳医科大学的研究人员最近在科学杂志《Blood》上发表的一项研究表明，癌症患者的出血比之前想象的更为常见，并且与预后不良和死亡风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Hemorrages-found-to-be-more-common-in-cancer-患者-than-previously-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Hemorrages-found-to-be-more-common-in-cancer-患者-than-previously-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb9f40fc-dcb0-449c-bc0e-e3ec7be8b1a2 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 09:05:59 -0400 Hemorrhages found to be more common in cancer patients than previously thought

发现 5-甲酰胞嘧啶作为表观遗传激活开关德国美因茨分子生物学研究所 (IMB) 的 Christof Niehrs 教授团队发现，一种名为 5-甲酰胞嘧啶 (5fC) 的 DNA 修饰可作为激活表观遗传开关，在早期胚胎发育中启动基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Discovery-of-5-formylcytosine-as-an-activating-epigenic-switch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Discovery-of-5-formylcytosine-as-an-activating-epigenic-switch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64648830-42e3-439d-80ad-28a4b98b6d9f Wed, 18 Sep 2024 08:55:06 -0400 Discovery of 5-formylcytosine as an activating epigenetic switch

Birnbaum 医学博士质量领导奖中被评为最佳绩效医院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Keck-Hospital-of-USC-recognized-as-top-performer-in-quality-leadership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Keck-Hospital-of-USC-recognized-as-top-performer-in-quality-leadership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2d5318b-bfe1-433d-8309-07cafd1c1c03 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 08:42:22 -0400 Keck Hospital of USC recognized as top performer in quality leadership
根据自我报告的数据低估健康差异对英格兰年度健康调查收集的数据进行的首次分析发现，在自称健康状况“较差”的人中，生活在高度贫困地区的人可能比生活在最贫困地区的人健康状况更差地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Underestimating-health-disparities-based-on-self-reported-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Underestimating-health-disparities-based-on-self-reported-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dc8111f-002e-4b0d-a360-8c002ca405e9 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 08:02:29 -0400 Underestimating health disparities based on self-reported data
授予 100 万美元赠款，用于探索多发性硬化症的髓磷脂修复机制国家多发性硬化症协会（美国）向 Isabel Pérez-Otaño 博士授予 100 万美元的资助，她是西班牙国家多发性硬化症协会联合中心神经科学研究所 (IN) 神经回路可塑性和重塑实验室的负责人。研究委员会 (CSIC) 和埃尔切米格尔·埃尔南德斯大学 (UMH)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/241-million-grant-awarded-to-explore-myelin-repair-mechanisms-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/241-million-grant-awarded-to-explore-myelin-repair-mechanisms-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c52c4fa4-922a-453d-bf55-da2bcacfdb1f Wed, 18 Sep 2024 07:44:21 -0400 $1 million grant awarded to explore myelin repair mechanisms in multiple sclerosis
了解阿尔茨海默病的大脑活动变化β-淀粉样蛋白和 tau 蛋白长期以来一直与阿尔茨海默病有关。这些蛋白质的病理积累会导致患有该疾病的人认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Understanding-brain-activity-shifts-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Understanding-brain-activity-shifts-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5c57827-a888-4b9a-bed9-c9d814b0f42f Wed, 18 Sep 2024 07:36:16 -0400 Understanding brain activity shifts in Alzheimer’s disease
合成尼古丁品牌是否遵循 FDA 营销指南？研究发现，Instagram 上 87% 的合成尼古丁电子烟帖子无视 FDA 健康警告要求，强调需要更严格的监管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Are-synthetic-nicotine-brands-following-FDA-marketing-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Are-synthetic-nicotine-brands-following-FDA-marketing-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e31cd77e-2b9b-4352-a542-3f8928c18518 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 07:34:00 -0400 Are synthetic nicotine brands following FDA marketing guidelines?
